questions.question: Which of the following allows you to categorize and track your AWS costs on a detailed level?
What is the best type of instance purchasing option to choose if you will run an EC2 instance for 3 months to perform a job that is uninterruptible?
How can your RDS production instances be more cost-effective when they will be used for a long period of time?

options.A: You can stop your RDS instances when idle to prevent AWS from charging you during this time
options.B: You can easily backup, terminate, and restore RDS instances when you need them
options.C: You can request reserved instances to get discounts on your instance costs
options.D: AWS does not charge you when your RDS is idle

questions.question: Where can the customer view his Reserved Instance usage for the past month?

A company is planning to deploy a high-frequency trading (HFT) application that will store constantly changing financial data in AWS and require low-latency access. Which AWS services should be used? (Select TWO.)
Which AWS service allows machine learning models to be trained using SQL commands and enables the integration of trained models within a data warehouse for forecasting purposes?

A company needs to run its workloads in a hybrid cloud. Due to regulatory compliance, some parts of the overall infrastructure need to be on-premises. The company wants to leverage the same API calls for both its AWS cloud and on-premises workloads. Which AWS service or offering is used to meet these requirements?

A company recently migrated its e-commerce application to AWS in order to handle a surge in customer traffic. The application is hosted on Amazon EC2 instances and uses Amazon RDS to manage the product catalog and inventory. Which of the following options provides disaster recovery solutions for Amazon EC2? (Select TWO).
Which service in AWS supports various business intelligence tools such as Apache Spark so that you may perform data transformation workloads (ETL) and analytics at a low cost?
Which AWS well-architected pillar stresses the importance of selecting the most appropriate and right number of resource types for your requirements?
A developer needs to access a Linux EC2 Instance to modify a WordPress configuration file. Which of the following methods let them connect to theirinstance’s Linux terminal? (Select TWO.)
A high-performance computing (HPC) application needs a storage service in AWS that can be used as a centralized Windows File Server for multiple EC2 instances. Which of the following should they use?
Which of the following AWS resources is a zonal service? (Select TWO.)
Which of the following AWS services is supported by a dedicated AWS team focused on infrastructure management to assist enterprises with large-scale cloud adoption?
Which of the following services will be able to reroute traffic to your secondary EC2 instances in another region during disaster recovery?
Which of the following options below is solely the responsibility of the customer in accordance with the AWS shared responsibility model?

options.B: Service and Communications Protection or Zone Security
options.D: Patching of the host operating system

questions.question: An employee is asking for access to your S3 buckets. What should be the level of access that you should provide to him?

options.C: Ask what type of access he requires and only provide him those permissions

questions.question: Which of the following is an AWS service that provides secure key storage and cryptographic operations, such as encryption and decryption, hashing, and digital signing?
The security team needs to automate security vulnerability assessments throughout their development and production environments. Which service should they use to comply with this requirement?

A company plans to encrypt and manage its own encryption keys using a single-tenant hardware security module. The company must also have exclusive control over how its keys are used via an authentication mechanism independent from AWS. Which service would meet that requirement?

A startup plans to host an application to an Amazon EC2 instance. The VPC subnets have custom network ACLs to ensure that only authorized traffic is allowed to access the application. Which of the following are features of network ACLs? (Select TWO.)

options.C: NACLs can be associated with multiple instances.
options.D: NACLs allow both inbound and outbound rules.
